title: [Admission] Original documents required
content: What are the original documents required to be submitted for seat confirmation? Pls

comments.body:
During the time of admission they will let you know, generally they would ask for  
1) 12th Original Mark sheet  
2) 10th Original Mark Sheet  
3) Transfer Certificate 

Also you can claim this back after 1st year. Or maybe 1st Sem.
I just finished and came out. Thanks thoüôè
I think its for UG Tell me about pg

Marksheets (10th and 12th)

Aadhaar or any other proof of identity that you gave @ the time of admission

passport size photos.

TC 

I think this is the basic
if submitted in other college, what to do. As other colleges start early, but PES 4th round is later. Want to quit the other college and take admission here depending on counselling

Hi..I‚Äôm in sem 3 at ECC. Last year, I submitted my original 10th and 12th mark sheets to the RR office, and they told me the docs would be transferred to ECC if I am not wrong. I‚Äôve applied for passport renewal and need those originals back in about 2 weeks. Should I write an application or just email the admin office? Planning to contact them tomorrow. Any tips on how to get my documents back smoothly?
If it's still in RR campus, you need to visit the MRD office and ask. If they say no...u should ask in the equivalent in the EC campus
